message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think a 55/45 split is more equitable.  Let's be fair but also efficient, we can't keep losing money to inflation!
I can meet you in the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Let's be reasonable and split it evenly. We've both been stubborn, and we're losing money with every round.  A 50/50 split is the best way to maximize our gains.
